translation.en: ♪ Watch me backflip ♪
♪ Let me work my magic ♪
translation.it: BASATO SUL LIBRO DEL DR. SEUSS

translation.en: [narrator] Just east of North Westville and south of Goo-bai,
translation.it: A est di Nord Westville e a sud di Goo-bai,

translation.en: a town known as Glurfsburg might catch your eye.
translation.it: la città di Glurfsburg attira attenzione come non mai.

translation.en: Our story starts here. Who knows what's in store?
translation.it: La storia inizia qui. Calmi e sentite.

translation.en: It begins with a kite, and then...
-[narrator] Shut the front door! -Whoa!
[narrator] That is a... That's a ninja!
This is Dr. Seuss, so I wasn't expecting-- Oh, why would you cut the line?
translation.it: Sono il dr. Seuss, non... Perché l'hai tagliata?

translation.en: What's a piece of paper gonna do? Oh, you just answered my question.
translation.it: Che ci fa con la carta? Ecco la risposta.

translation.en: Dive roll!
[narrator] This sneak has snuck into a zoo!
Past the Moostrich,
the Walvark,
and the Llama-Gnu.
[narrator] That wall is no problem. It's barely a hurdle!
translation.it: Quel muro è facile, non è un ostacolo!

translation.en: But the same can't be said of those large slapping turtles!
translation.it: Ma le tartarughe schiaffeggianti sono un pericolo!

translation.en: -Oh! With the right flipper! -[screaming]
Okay, okay. Shh, shh, shh, shh. Easy. Easy, now.
translation.it: Ok, va bene. Shh... Calma, ora.

translation.en: Easy!
Easy, big fella.
[narrator] Yet, when the guard got there, see what he learnt:
translation.it: Ma la guardia vide al suo arrivo...

translation.en: The cage was still present, but man and beast... weren't.
translation.it: ...che c'era la gabbia, ma di uomo e bestia il luogo era privo.

translation.en: On your left! Busy inventor coming through!
translation.it: A sinistra! Inventore impegnato in arrivo!

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna be late! I'm going to be late!
[narrator] "Who's this guy," you wonder, "rushing round in a hurry?"
translation.it: Chi è questo tizio di fretta?

translation.en: Relax with the questions. We'll get there. Don't worry.
translation.it: Piano con le domande, ci arriveremo. Datemi retta.

translation.en: -[bell sounds] -[Guy] Right on time.
This is it.
Who puts a puddle--
-Oh! -Hey, mister! Save the Yips?
No time.
They have the Yaps, but we're searching for a cure!
translation.it: Hanno lo yap, ma cerchiamo una cura!

translation.en: Please, sign here.
Stupid Yips and Yaps making me late!
translation.it: Stupidi yip e yap, farò tardi!

translation.en: [woman] Oh.
E-Excuse me, sir.
Would you mind taking a photo of us?
-No! -Great! Thanks.
That's not what I meant. It's the button on top.
translation.it: - Ho detto no! - È quel pulsante.

translation.en: Say, "I'm ruining your life!"
[all] "We're ruining your life!"
-[smashing button] -Oh, come on!
I'm Guy, life-long inventor, here for the biggest meeting of my life!
translation.it: Sono Felice. Inventore. Sono qui per la grande riunione!

translation.en: That's nice.
Have a seat. We'll be with you in the next seven hours.
translation.it: Si sieda, saremo da lei tra sette ore.

translation.en: [narrator] Look at the neat and amazing inventions! Every one worthy of Snerz's attention!
translation.it: Guardate che belle invenzioni! Attireranno di Snerz le attenzioni!

translation.en: -There's an anti-umbrella! -[gasps]
And a tree stump de-rooter!
And right over there is a narrator muter!
I wonder what that does?
[voice fading] Wait! Hold on! No! Stop turning the dial, please! I can't--
-[people applauding] -Yours is a winner for sure!
All right! Woo-hoo! I'm going to Meepville!
[woman] Oh, I hope we make the cut!
Fingers crossed!
Ooh! An auto finger-crosser? They said it couldn't be done!
-[sighs] -So, what's your invention?
It's, uh... It's nothing special.
Ooh! Nothing special? Sounds special!
[man] Ooh, nice!
Get a load of that! Snerz is gonna love that!
[narrator] A narrator muter? These people have no idea what I do. This is my craft--
translation.it: Un silenzia-narratore? Non sanno che faccio. È...

translation.en: -Support the Yips, sir? -[narrator] Ah-ha! I'm back! My volume's off zero!
translation.it: - Aiuti gli yip! - Sono tornato! Mi sentite?

translation.en: -Just in time to meet our other hero! -[whistling]
translation.it: In tempo affinché l'altro eroe incontriate!

translation.en: Whoa! Nice, try there, puddle. Not gonna catch me!
translation.it: Bene, ci hai provato, pozzanghera. Ma con me non funziona!

translation.en: Ah, why not?
-[woman] Mister, support the Yips? -Yips?
-Oh! -I heard they have the Yaps.
Just tragic. Okay, where do I sign? Can I do it more than once?
translation.it: Che tragedia! Dove firmo? Posso farlo più volte?

translation.en: Boing! Handspring!
Whoo! [laughs]
Here we go! Uh-oh! Coming through!
Oh, family photo! Priceless moment! Say cheese!
translation.it: Foto di famiglia! Un momento inestimabile! Cheese!

translation.en: -Give me duck face! Tea pot arms! -[family laughs]
translation.it: Papera! Braccia sui fianchi! Gamba in aria!

translation.en: Put a leg in the air! Pucker hard! Squat!
translation.it: Papera! Braccia sui fianchi! Gamba in aria! Corrucciati! Squat! Urlo!

translation.en: -Scream! -[family screams]
Thanks, Mister!
Hey, what's your name?
I'm Sam.
Sam-I-Am.
Guy-Am-I?
Is there a Guy-Am-I here?
translation.it: C'è un Felice Non Si Addice?

translation.en: I'm the only person in this room.
You sure there isn't anyone else you want to squeeze in first?
translation.it: Sicura non ci sia qualcuno da far entrare prima?

translation.en: Nope. You're the absolute, very last person they wanted to see.
translation.it: No. Sei l'ultima persona che volevano vedere.

translation.en: Lose the frown, kid.
They're just a bunch of bean counters and pencil pushers.
One bean.
Two beans.
[narrator] Our friend Guy-Am-I hasn't been a success.
translation.it: Non aveva successo, Felice Non Si Addice.

translation.en: Every invention's ended up a huge mess.
All that failure has made his hope nearly run dry.
translation.it: I fallimenti ponevano alle sue speranze un interrogativo.

translation.en: But today, he's gonna give it...
One last try.
7,462 beans.
7,463 beans.
All right, buddy. You're up.
[male Honcho] Dazzle us.
Isn't travel the worst?
Trapped on a cold air balloon with a bunch of strangers, all of 'em yacking at you,
translation.it: Intrappolati su una mongolfiera con estranei che blaterano,

translation.en: pestering you, never letting you stew in peace.
translation.it: vi seccano e non vi lasciano in pace.

translation.en: Stuck at the mercy of someone else's schedule as the last bus pulls away,
translation.it: Alla mercé di qualcuno, mentre l'ultimo bus parte senza di voi!

translation.en: -and you're not on it! -7,469 beans.
translation.it: Alla mercé di qualcuno, mentre l'ultimo bus parte senza di voi! Sono 7.469.

translation.en: Well, what if you could go where you want to,
translation.it: E se poteste andare dove volete,

translation.en: whenever you want to, entirely on your own?
Now you can.
With the Self-Flyer.
-Hmm, interesting. -Ooh. -I'm leaning in. -Intriguing.
I was ignoring the sad man, but he has my attention now!
translation.it: Ignoravo l'uomo triste, ma ora sono interessato!

translation.en: Exclusive, aspirational, definitely Snerz-worthy!
Oh! [chuckles wryly] That's good.
Just what every child needs! A death trap strapped onto their back!
translation.it: Una trappola mortale sulle spalle di un bambino.

translation.en: This thing is 100% safe,
as you will see in the following demonstration, when I 100% won't explode.
translation.it: come vedrete nella dimostrazione quando, al 100%, non esploderò.

translation.en: Ooh, I like it.
Don't explode. Don't explode. Don't explode.
Wowzers!
I'm not exploding!
Self-Flyer.
I think we're all in agreement.
You're going to Meepville! Get ready to pitch to Snerz himself!
translation.it: Andrai a Meepville! Preparati a presentarlo a Snerz in persona!

translation.en: See you...
SnerzDay!
[narrator] Guy felt fantastic! He'd finally won!
He'd invented a thing-a-ma-do that had done!
No, not my beans!
[male Honcho] Holy moly!
Oh, dear.
translation.it: Cielo! Non dirò che l'avevo detto. Perché l'ho scritto.

translation.en: I'm not gonna say, "I told you so," because I've written it down.
translation.it: Cielo! Non dirò che l'avevo detto. Perché l'ho scritto. L'AVEVO DETTO

translation.en: [narrator] Guy wondered why he bothered to even show up...
when everything he invented was sure to blow up.
There's Guy's critic, bean counter Michellee, whose face always looked like she'd smelled something... smelly.
translation.it: Michellee, di Felice il terrore. Sembra senta sempre cattivo odore.

translation.en: Oh, just the thought of that awful device gives me the fuzzles.
translation.it: Pensare a quel coso mi dà i brividi.

translation.en: I wouldn't let my daughter go anywhere near it. [sighs]
E.B. is very fragile.
[narrator] E.B.'s not so fragile. If her mom only knew
translation.it: E.B. non è fragile. La madre non sa niente!

translation.en: that she's luring a Pandog with cheese-stuffed bamboo.
translation.it: Attira un pancane con bambù al formaggio filante.

translation.en: [narrator] Mom would have a conniption. "No pets is the rule!"
translation.it: Alla mamma verrebbe un colpo: "Niente animali!"

translation.en: But E.B.'s not listening, 'cause... A pet would be cool!
translation.it: Ma E.B. non ascolta, a lei paiono ideali!

translation.en: Come on!
Come on!
Don't worry. I won't tell your mother.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Non lo dirò a tua madre.

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you, Mrs. McGrisses.
As long as you buy me a car!
-What? -I like them red and fast!
translation.it: - Che cosa? - Mi piacciono rosse e veloci.

translation.en: Flames on the side.
You know I'm ten, right?
translation.it: Sai che ho dieci anni, vero?

translation.en: Hey, E.B.! Wanna ride occycles?
Do I want to? Yes.
Can I? No.
Because I don't have one. Because my mom won't let me.
translation.it: Non ce l'ho. Mia madre non vuole.

translation.en: Hey, why don't you hop on my handlebars then?
translation.it: Ehi, perché non salti sul mio manubrio?

translation.en: My mom would be able to tell. She checks my eyebrows for wind-blownness
translation.it: Se ne accorgerebbe. Mi controlla le sopracciglia

translation.en: and my general disposition for any traces of exhilaration or whimsy.
translation.it: e l'umore in cerca di euforia o stravaganza.

translation.en: Ouch.
Yeah, you should just get out of here. Just this conversation is slightly whimsilarating.
translation.it: Sì, dovresti andare. Solo parlarne mi rende euforica.

translation.en: We interrupt this old person soap opera to report:
a Chickeraffe has escaped the Glurfsburg Zoo!
translation.it: Una polliraffa è fuggita dallo zoo!

translation.en: This animal is wild and should be considered extremely dangerous!
translation.it: Questo animale è selvaggio ed estremamente pericoloso!

translation.en: Looks like I just found my new pet.
translation.it: Forse ho trovato il mio nuovo animale.

translation.en: [man] Greetings, we have some questions about the Chickeraffe.
translation.it: Salve, abbiamo delle domande sulla polliraffa.

translation.en: [sighs] I already told you cops everything I know.
translation.it: Vi ho già detto tutto ciò che so.

translation.en: Eh-eh. We're not the cops. We're the BADGUYS.
translation.it: - Non siamo poliziotti. Siamo cattivi. - È anche sul biglietto!

translation.en: Yeah, it's even on our card. Check it out!
translation.it: - Non siamo poliziotti. Siamo cattivi. - È anche sul biglietto! I CATTIVI

translation.en: Sweet font, huh? You have cards?
translation.it: - Bel font, no? - Avete biglietti da visita?

translation.en: D-Don't hurt me! I-I-I'll tell you anything!
translation.it: Non fatemi male! Vi dirò tutto!

translation.en: -[grunts] -Where is the Chickeraffe?
Better talk fast, 'cause this pole's getting really heavy!
[whimpers] I-It just escaped! It ran away!
He's a liar! Please, McWinkle. Can I drop him, please?
translation.it: È un bugiardo! Per favore, McWinkle. Posso lasciarlo?

translation.en: If the man were a liar, his pants would be on fire.
translation.it: Se mentisse, i suoi pantaloni sarebbero in fiamme.

translation.en: Those are clearly just scaredy pants.
Tell me, coward, did you find anything unusual at the scene?
translation.it: Dimmi, codardo, c'era qualcosa d'insolito sulla scena?

translation.en: Unusual? No. Just a kite, a snorkel, and a pole vault pole.
translation.it: Insolito? No. Solo un aquilone, un boccaglio e un'asta.

translation.en: Gluntz, let him go.
[McWinkle] I meant let him go... free.
Oops! My bad. My bad.
[Gluntz] Sorry 'bout that.
How many jobs have I done, Gluntz?
862! A BADGUY record!
And how many jobs have you done? Roof slide!
translation.it: - E tu, invece? - Scivolata! Uno, signore.

translation.en: One, sir! Uh, counting this one.
translation.it: - E tu, invece? - Scivolata! Uno, signore. Contando questo. E, se posso, è stato pazzesco!

translation.en: And may I just say, it has been sick!
translation.it: Contando questo. E, se posso, è stato pazzesco!

translation.en: This was no escape. Someone broke in and took that Chickeraffe.
translation.it: Non era una fuga. Sono entrati e l'hanno presa.

translation.en: That someone has the animal. He is our target.
translation.it: Ce l'ha qualcuno, ed è il nostro obiettivo.

translation.en: Can you see me? I am jacked right now! [exclaims] I have always wanted a target!
translation.it: Guardatemi! Sono a mille! Ho sempre voluto un obiettivo!

translation.en: We find the target, we find the Chickeraffe
and deliver it directly to the Bigman.
translation.it: E la consegneremo direttamente al Grande Capo.

translation.en: [narrator] In Meepville, there was no man bigger than Snerz,
translation.it: A Meepville, Snerz era il più grande di tutti,

translation.en: whose hair was, in fact, just a miniature Flerz.
translation.it: anche i suoi capelli erano un mini flizzo, difatti.

translation.en: Tell me, Yes Man, is it ready?
Y-Yes, Mr. Snerz.
[narrator] He owned everything that a Snerson could own!
Like a solid gold stapler and a gold-plated stone.
translation.it: Una spillatrice e un masso d'oro possedeva.

translation.en: Careful with my stone!
It's covered in gold!
[straining] Yes, Mr. Snerz.
[narrator] But his pets were his most belovedest treasures.
translation.it: Ma gli animali, dei suoi tesori erano il perno.

translation.en: Animal friends who'd be with him...
-[thunder crashes] -[narrator] ...forever.
Greetings, little ones!
-[animal groaning] -[Snerz] Stay!
That's very good.
Daddy loves you, too.
[narrator] Just one spot remained on Snerz's wall, and it was reserved for the rarest of all.
translation.it: A Snerz era rimasto un solo punto sul muro ed era riservato all'animale più raro.

translation.en: -[thunder crashes] -[Snerz laughs]
[narrator] Guy has inventions but no place called home.
translation.it: Felice inventa, ma casa non ha.

translation.en: And right now, he's desperate to take off and roam.
translation.it: E ora di vagare ha voglia e lo sa.

translation.en: Where does it matter, be it far or near? As long as it's AnyOldWhereButHere.
translation.it: Non importa davvero dove andrà, basta che sia lontano da questa città.

translation.en: [announcer over PA] The 4:28 bus to AnyOldWhereButHere is departing in three seconds.
translation.it: L'autobus per Lontano da questa città parte tra tre secondi.

translation.en: -Three seconds until-- -[Guy] No!
[announcer] That's it. That was three seconds.
No! Stop the bus, please!
Stop the bus!
Stupid invention!
Stupid Guy!
I give up!
Stupid bus! Stupid town! Stupid sidewalk!
translation.it: Stupido autobus! Stupida città! Stupido marciapiede!

translation.en: Stupid hat.
Welcome to our diner, diner!
Okay...
-Apps are over here. -I'll have the oatmush.
translation.it: - Qui c'è... - Voglio la zuppa d''avena.

translation.en: Swirl of jam with that?
-No. -How about a touch of honey, honey?
translation.it: - Riccioli di marmellata? - No. Un po' di miele?

translation.en: Just oatmush, dry, and a spoon.
translation.it: Solo zuppa d'avena. Secca. E un cucchiaio.

translation.en: One Sad Man's Special!
[cook] One Sad Man's Special comin' up!
[narrator] What to do next? Certainly not invent.
translation.it: E ora che fare? Di certo non inventare.

translation.en: [narrator] But Guy needed something to help pay the rent.
[Sam] Afternoon, Donna.
Love what you've done with your fur! [Donna] Oh, you! Same as it always is.
translation.it: - La tua pelliccia è splendida oggi. - Oh, è sempre la stessa!

translation.en: Oh, wow. Look at this!
We're Briefcase Buddies!
It's like finding a matching snowflake.
translation.it: È come trovare due fiocchi di neve identici.

translation.en: It's an unremarkable attache sold in most major stores.
translation.it: È un'anonima valigia, venduta in tutti i negozi.

translation.en: And we both bought it!
Plus, to end up sitting next to each other like this.
I mean... wow.
I'm just gonna say wow!
I am Sam.
Sam-I-Am. Of the Glurfsburg I-Am's.
translation.it: Nando Detto Ferdi. Dei Detto Ferdi di Glurfsburg.

translation.en: Perhaps you've heard of us? What's your handle, partner?
translation.it: Forse ne hai sentito parlare. Tu chi sei?

translation.en: Grrrumph! Lovely name. How do you spell that?
translation.it: Grrrumph! Bel nome, come si scrive?

translation.en: Is that one rumph or two?
So, Sam, I imagine you'll be having the ushe?
If you insist.
-Green eggs and ham! -[cook] Comin' up!
translation.it: - Prosciutto e uova verdi! - In arrivo!

translation.en: Yuck!
[gasps] You don't like green eggs and ham?
No, I do not like them, Sam-I-Am.
I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.it: Non mi piacciono prosciutto e uova verdi.

translation.en: Understood. Question asked and answered.
No further queries necessary.
Have you ever tried them before?
[sighs] No.
Well, how can you be so sure you don't like 'em if you've never actually eaten 'em?
Well, I've never eaten Walvark droppings, but I'm certain I wouldn't enjoy those either.
translation.it: Come so che non mi piacerebbero gli escrementi di tricofante.

translation.en: But green eggs and ham are the most deliciousist, nutritiousist, greenisist thing in the world!
translation.it: Sono la cosa più deliziante, nutriziosa ed ecologicosa del mondo!

translation.en: And PS, they're especially good here. That's fantastic.
translation.it: - E poi qui li fanno buonissimi. - Fantastico.

translation.en: But I don't want them, here or otherwise.
translation.it: Ma non li voglio né qui, né altrove.

translation.en: Tell you what, make that two orders, Donna. On me.
translation.it: Dai, portane due, Donna. Pago io.

translation.en: No! Just oatmush! And a spoon!
translation.it: No! Solo zuppa d'avena e un cucchiaio!

translation.en: Sad Man's Special. Tsk!
Suit yourself.
So, what'd you fail at?
[growls] Would you please just leave me alone? -[bell dings] -[cook] Order up!
translation.it: - Mi lasci in pace? - È pronto!

translation.en: Oh, boy! Oh, boy! Oh, boy! It's coming!
Bring them in for a landing! The hangar is open!
-Here's the ushe, hun. Enjoy. -Oh, yes!
translation.it: - Ecco il solito. Buon appetito. - Sì!

translation.en: Excuse me, but I ordered mine first.
translation.it: Scusi, ma ho ordinato per primo.

translation.en: Food comes out when it's ready.
Oh, that's a good nose. It's an eggy nose.
I'm getting hints of egg, and yes, definitely green.
translation.it: Sento aroma di uova e, sì, decisamente verdi.

translation.en: Yuck!
Mmm! This is so good!
It's like eating little pieces of joy.
[moans] Each bite!
Joy!
Mmm! More joy!
What do you recommend for a celebration? Because...
[all] We're going to Meepville!
-Drop the flavor hammer, Bert! -[cook] You got it!
translation.it: - Dacci dentro, Bert! - Ci penso io!

translation.en: -Egg-cellent! -Fantastic!
So green! Can't wait to try them in Meepville!
translation.it: - Così verdi! - Voglio provarli a Meepville!

translation.en: ♪ Funny, but it's true ♪
translation.it: SELEZIONATI TUTTI GLI INVENTORI TRANNE UNO

translation.en: Hey, Donna, sorry to be a nudge,
but my Briefcase Buddy here is still waiting on an oatmush.
translation.it: ma il mio amico aspetta la zuppa d'avena.

translation.en: -Spoon on the side? -You got it, sport.
Thanks. You're a peach.
Thank you. No problem.
That's what best friends are for! -I just met you. -[bell dings]
translation.it: - A questo servono gli amici! - Non ti conosco!

translation.en: -Sad Man's Special. -[sighs] Finally.
Careful! That bowl's hot!
I'm fine. Okay?
Great meeting you, Grumph!
My name is Guy.
Huh, that's a weird name.
Chickeraffe-catching apparatus complete.
Now, to test it on our first live subject,
the rare northeastern babysitter.
E.B., I'm home.
-E.B.? -Your daughter owes me a car.
translation.it: - E.B.? - Sua figlia mi deve un'auto.

translation.en: It's gonna be red. Okay.
Well, thank you, Mrs. McGrisses. Yeah.
Oh, uh... [clears throat] Good evening, Mother!
Oh! There's the bean that counts most of all.
translation.it: Il fagiolo che conta più di tutti.

translation.en: I detect a hint of... -whimsy? -[grunts]
I'll allow it.
So, who's excited about our big business trip?
Me. I am. Definitely.
But... counter-proposal, maybe I could just stay here.
translation.it: Ma, controproposta, forse potrei restare qui.

translation.en: But I thought you were looking forward to seeing Meepville.
You know, I'm just worried about the big city,
translation.it: Sai, mi spaventa la grande città.

translation.en: where every step is a roll of the dice.
translation.it: Dove ogni passo è una scommessa.

translation.en: Maybe I'd be safer here in boring Glurfsburg where nothing ever happens.
translation.it: È più sicuro qui dove non succede mai niente.

translation.en: [man on TV] Something happens in Glurfsburg!
If there are children or over-protective single mothers in the room,
-you may want to ask them to leave. -Oh, my!
Do not panic! Chickeraffes are incredibly scary!
translation.it: Niente panico! Le polliraffe sono spaventose!

translation.en: They have huge teeth, sharp claws, a beak that can snap a man in two...
translation.it: Denti enormi, artigli affilati, becco feroce...

translation.en: I've-- I've seen this one before.
Spoiler alert: It's all made up and not worth paying attention to.
translation.it: È tutto inventato, non dargli retta.

translation.en: Stare at one too long, and it'll steal your soul!
translation.it: Se la fissate, vi ruberà l'anima!

translation.en: Ah! What was that?
Was that a Chickeraffe? Run for your lives!
It can smell my fear!
Oh! Oh, my! Right here in Glurfsburg?
Cheese-stuffed bamboo?
E.B., this creature is not a pet. It's terror on four feet!
translation.it: Non è un animaletto. È un mostro a quattro zampe!

translation.en: Chickeraffes walk on two feet, Mom.
Of course. So they can use the other two to mash their prey into a fine paste.
translation.it: Certo. Così con le altre due ci sgretolare la preda.

translation.en: You are definitely coming with me to Meepville, young lady.
And yes, the big city can be dangerous.
translation.it: E sì, la grande città può essere pericolosa.

translation.en: Which is why we have these! They're Friendship Bracelets!
translation.it: Però abbiamo questi! Sono braccialetti dell'amicizia!

translation.en: [bracelets] Genuine Friendship!
-[Michellee] Fun! Right? -[groans]
This way, we can stick together and be safe always, like friends.
translation.it: Così saremo insieme al sicuro come amiche.

translation.en: [narrator] The time hadcome to choose a choice.
translation.it: Era ora di fare una scelta.

translation.en: I do love inventing.
[narrator] Said his hopefulest voice.
But stuff blowing up is a valid complaint.
Could it be time to start watching paint?
[Sam] Hey, drive safe, Philip!
You may say those leftovers are for the Pandog,
but we all know they're for you. Am I right? [chuckles]
translation.it: Quegli avanzi sono per te, vero?

translation.en: Oh, classic Philip.
Mmkay, it's closing time, Sam. Oh, right.
translation.it: - È ora di chiudere, Nando. - Certo.

translation.en: Right. Thanks, Donna.
It's getting late. I should probably be heading home anyway.
translation.it: È tardi. Dovrei andare a casa.

translation.en: Got a bunch of friends there waiting for me.
translation.it: Ho un gruppo di amici che mi aspettano.

translation.en: Gonna be a real hoot. Possibly a double hoot.
translation.it: Sarà uno spasso. Forse un doppio spasso.

translation.en: I should give you my address in case you and the kitchen staff feel like coming by.
translation.it: Ti lascio l'indirizzo, se volete venire.

translation.en: I still have it, Sam.
From the last time you invited us?
And the six times before that.
Oh, yeah. Of course.
Of course!
Night, Donna!
[Donna] Goodnight, Sam.
-[sighs] -[over radio] This is Officer 17 reminding all unitsthat the Chickeraffe -is extremely dangerous! -Oh!
translation.it: A tutte le unità, ricordate che la polliraffa è pericolosa!

translation.en: -Please proceed with caution! -[siren wails]
-[grunts] -[cop 1] Did you see that? [cop 2] Uh, yeah, I think it went down that alley.
translation.it: - L'hai visto? - Sì, è andato di là.

translation.en: Dun, dun, dun!
[cop 1 gasps] Was that it? Check it out!
[cop 2] Uh, you go first!
You're coming with me, Chickeraffe.
[people in pool] We're going to Meepville!
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪ ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
[man] You can still hear us!
[people in pool] Those are just curtains!
[people in pool singing] ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville... ♪
translation.it: Ba ba ba ba Meepville! Ba ba ba ba Meepville!

translation.en: [narrator] Guy picked the briefcase! He'll fix his Self-Flyer!
translation.it: Ha preso la valigia! Aggiusterà l'autoplano!

translation.en: My bad. He's tossing it into that fire.
translation.it: Anzi, no. Lo brucia pian piano.

translation.en: No, no, no!
